title: Isu i thu ka ngaihtuahin
lyrics:
Isu, i thu ka ngaihtuahin,
Ka lo lawm em em thin;
I hmel tak ka hmuh hunah chuan,
Ka lawmna a zual ang.

Khawvel aw mawi zawng zawngah hian,
Rimawi tinreng zingah;
Mihring chhandamtu i hming hi,
Thawm mawi ber a ni fo.

Inchhirte beisei chhan a ni,
Retheite lawmna pawh;
Tlu tawhte chungah i tha si,
I zawngtu chungah pawh.

Nang hmututen an lawm zia hi,
Thuin an sawi thei lo;
Kan chhuan ber chu lo ni fo la,
Chatuan hmun thleng pawhin.

Isu, ka lawmna ber ni la,
Leiah leh vanah pawh;
Kan chhuan ber chu lo ni fo la,
Chatuan hmun thleng pawhin.
